## Graph overview
::: {style="font-size: 1.25em; color: #02577A;"}

:::

<br>

```{r}
#| label: full_code_display
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| out-height: '60%'
#| out-width: '60%'
#| fig-align: right
library(palmerpenguins) 
library(ggplot2movies)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(ggplot2)
df <- tibble::tibble(X = sample(x = 1:100, 10, FALSE),
                     Y = rlnorm(10, 1, 3))
labs_graph <- ggplot2::labs(title = "Title", 
                            subtitle = "subtitle", 
                            x = "X", y = "Y")

ggp2_graph <- ggplot2::ggplot(data = df, 
    mapping = aes(x = X, y = Y)) + 
    ggplot2::geom_blank()

ggp2_graph + 
    labs_graph
```

::: {style="font-size: 1.10em; color: #02577A;"}
**This graph requires:**
:::

::: {style="font-size: 1.05em; color: #282b2d;"}
**`r emo::ji("check")` a categorical variable**      
:::

::: {style="font-size: 1.05em; color: #282b2d;"}
**`r emo::ji("check")` a numeric (continuous) variable**
:::

### Code

::: {style="font-size: 1.15em; color: #1e83c8;"}
**CODE:**
:::

::: {style="font-size: 0.85em;"}

Create labels with `labs()`

Initialize the graph with `ggplot()` and provide `data`

:::

::: {style="font-size: 0.75em;"}
```{r}
#| label: code_graph_dags
#| eval: false
#| echo: true 
#| warning: false

#| out-height: '100%'

labs_graph <- ggplot2::labs(title = "Title", 
                            subtitle = "subtitle", 
                            x = "X", y = "Y")

ggp2_graph <- ggplot2::ggplot(data = df, 
    mapping = aes(x = X, y = Y)) + 
    ggplot2::geom_blank()

ggp2_graph + 
    labs_graph
```
